summary: Provides dataset and sampler utilities for the SEAL (Subgraph Extraction and Labeling) framework, enabling efficient extraction of k‑hop subgraphs around target node pairs, generation of balanced positive/negative edge sets, and seamless integration with PyTorch DataLoaders for link‑prediction training and evaluation.
business_intent: Facilitate scalable preparation of high‑quality training data for graph link‑prediction models, reducing preprocessing overhead and supporting parallel subgraph extraction in production or research pipelines.
